bug.author: skeinan
bug.description: Hi guys, In "tox21_tf_progressive.py": There is no ProgressiveMultitaskClassifier, maybe you meant "ProgressiveMultitaskRegressor"? Thanks, Shahar

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/skeinan>@skeinan</denchmark-link> Good catch! The Tox21 is a classification task, so we need to use a classifier. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/miaecle>@miaecle</denchmark-link> Would it be hard to add a ? If so, we might want to consider just removing the example.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/rbharath>@rbharath</denchmark-link> I think it will be pretty straightforward, I could help with it(though we haven't applied the model on any classification tasks before)
